Title: We Have the Technology
Description:
During our... long discussion about how to find Tyr's disc, Chromie and I agreed that you were the right person to help us, $n. But finding the location of Tyr's disc could be very dangerous and would likely require more than just your help.

While I work here to narrow down what we need to find the disc, Chromie can give you more details.
ObjectivesText: Ask Chromie about the plan to recover Tyr's memory disc.
